title: Russia seizes Europe's biggest nuclear plant in 'reckless' assault
content:
1. Russia seizes Europe's biggest nuclear plant in 'reckless' assault  Reuters.com
  2. 'WAKE UP NOW': Zelenskyy warns Europe of nuclear war after power plant shelling  LiveNOW from FOX
  3. The Ukrainian nuclear operator says management at the seized plant is "working at gunpoint"  CNN
  4. Russia seizes control of Ukraine nuclear plant after shelling  Guardian News
  5. Ukraine's president urges Russians to protest over attack on nuclear plant  Reuters UK
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
